product_name: Nathan Speed 2 Hydration Waistpack - 20 fl. oz. - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Ideal for carrying fluids and fuel during long road and trail runs, the Nathan Speed 2 waistpack sits securely on your hips so you aren't slowed down by holding onto heavy water bottles. Dual molded holsters are easily accessible and securely carry 2 BPA-free, 10-oz. flasks. Elasticized waistbelt with moisture-wicking air-mesh lumbar backing helps keep you cool and dry. Stash pocket holds your keys, credit card and energy gel. Closeout.
short_description: Ideal for carrying fluids and fuel during long road and trail runs, the Nathan Speed 2 waistpack sits securely on your hips so you aren't slowed down by holding onto heavy water bottles.
